General.Name: Shandong Longda Meat Foodstuff Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Longda Meishi Co., Ltd. operates as a meat processing company in China. The company provides pig breeding, midstream slaughtering and finishing processing, and downstream prefabricated vegetables and meat products. It provides food safety testing services. In addition, it prepared dishes; ready-to-eat dishes; prepared foods; deli meat products; and snack foods. It exports its products. The company was formerly known as Shandong Longda Meat Foodstuff Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shandong Longda Meishi Co., Ltd. in December 2021. Shandong Longda Meishi Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Laiyang City, China.
General.Address: No. 99, Longmen East Road, Laiyang, China
